website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for beginners who aren't sure which size cup to purchase. Easy to use and the results are remarkable.
pros: Each silicone cup has a smooth, rounded edge so it's comfortable on the mouth
When used properly you'll be left with full, pouty lips with no red lines or bruising
This package comes with a small, medium and large cup to fit everyone's needs

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews often but was so impressed with results I wanted to share. Had been researching all the different lip plumping devices for about a week. Decided to go with this one because it had pretty good reviews. It took me a few minutes to get the hang of it (at first I thought it might be a “dud” product as I couldn’t get It to sucrion to my lips) but wow! Once I figured it out I was very pleased! So happy I found and bought this product. Also, it’s been almost 2 hours since using and my lips are still pretty plump 👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fazzini

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this so much! It actually worked haha I was impressed! I've already shared it (along with your link) in several makeup groups on FB so I hope you get some incredible sales! I included pics (one before-which was even before I received the prdoduct, second during-yesterday which is when I received it, and third is after-yesterday and I did it a few times while doing my makeup to try and get the hang of it) ☺️ Happy Thanksgiving everyone 🦃🍁🍽
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Danek

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome had a little bit of trouble with the suction ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome had a little bit of trouble with the suction at first, here is a tip for anyone that experiences the same issue. Cut a drink stirrer or straw in half and place in between your lips, than put the plumper over the straw and suck. It will create a small opening in your lips so that you can hold constant pressure when using the product. once I did that I had no problem, and my lips come out beautiful and plump.
customer_reviews.author: Badcmpni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works! I was skeptical but was impressed with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to a T! I used very small/slight suction in 10 second increments 3x about 45 mins apart and ended up with awful bruising around my lower lip area. As for the "plumping" affect... Minimal, it disappears within 20mins. I'm a dang fool for buying this stupid product. I need to just be happy with my own lips. Heck! Never even bruised when I had lip injections done years ago! Waste of money! And now, I'm going to a bachelorette party today with bruising around my mouth🙄
customer_reviews.author: April Roe-Langley

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Your product is such a scam!!!! The results last only 2-5 Minutes! I can not believe they sell this to people!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t realize it was hard plastic when I tried using it I got very uneven results and disappointment. The thickness of the plastic and incredibly small ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so hard to use!! I didn’t realize it was hard plastic when I tried using it I got very uneven results and disappointment. The thickness of the plastic and incredibly small opening made it near impossible to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it’s a waste of money 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied , this product is a big lie !!!! Hard plastic and doesn’t do the job !!! Makes your skin around your lips red and blue !!!!!! Don’t buy ... I don’t know why this product has so much good reviews and high rating !!! Maybe they are all fake reviews and ratings
customer_reviews.author: Rajaa

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS!!! It left my lips so bruised and hideous looking. I did give it a few chances to see if it work for me but it didnt.
customer_reviews.author: Chiviz

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! Now I don't have to wonder
customer_reviews.text: Received this product two days after purchasing! I was debating between the large oval or large round, but purchased large oval due to reviews. Received both!! AWESOME! Now I don't have to wonder. So far, it's easy to use and actually works. HOWEVER, it seems to last only an hour. I've only used it once for about 2 minutes. So I'll test it a few more times and write an updated review. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: ptac27048

customer_reviews.title: I DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I’m not even on the fence with this product it’s just gonna be an easy NO for me. It was difficult to get it to suction and to even stay on even after following directions. I had to go back and look at YouTube videos to assist. But the end result was swollen disfigured looking lips. I just looked like the Nutty professor. This product was a waste of money for me. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: PanamaPrincess

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work for other people
customer_reviews.text: I had to figure out how to use this product through a lot of trial and error. It comes with directions and two differently shaped lip enhancers, one a circle and the other an oval, as well as a card with instructions and how to care for it. There was also a set of imdirections and instructions in each box. However, they kept sliding off my lips and I tried to use each one for a minute to make up for that, and I had no results. I gave it three stars because it was in good condition and the customer service is great. Maybe my mouth is just too small for anything but injections to help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👎 boo doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work!! Even a water bottle top works better then these. The presentation super cute & fun but all it does is bruise ur lips& turn them bright reddish blue.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Verdict is out...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used once, and it works...nothing dramatic, but I did see a noticeable difference. It does not last long though (not even an hour). But I hear results improve with time, so I'll keep trying. Note: I only used for 30 seconds and was careful to not let it suction onto the outside area beyond my lips because I have seen many photos of women with hickey marks on their upper lips and I was NOT going to let that happen! Overall it's ok so far, but not sure if it's really worth $20.
customer_reviews.author: UllaBee

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: Hard as rock not made for someone who has lip piercings I could not get a hold of the company that made the product as it states in the directions if you need a different size so I finally gave up and return them do not waste your money on this product I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sally F

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: this product is definitely not a product that you would want to purchase if you're wanting your lips to be plumped for more than 5 minutes no matter how many times I've done it my lips will not stay plump for more than 5 minutes I've even sat with this plumper on my lips for like 6 minutes my lips were beautiful and they were right back to normal within 5 minutes I've used other lip plumpers similar and gotten a much longer result for whatever reason this doesn't have a strong enough suction for the fullness to last and I'm super disappointed because I really thought it was going to be a good product considering it's 20.00
customer_reviews.author: bridget trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Really, really works
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about these but decided to try them since my lips are so thin. I was amazed at how well these worked and I plan on telling all my friends about them. Simply amazing how much more volume I have in my lips now. I tried them first at night and to my surprise, the next morning my lips were stull full. I rarely find anything that I want to take the time to leave a review for but thos product is wonderful!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: earlene sexton

customer_reviews.title: Eh...not the best, sorry!
customer_reviews.text: So i wanted this to work!! Im bummed!! It does make my lips fuller...for a few minutes...if i suck on it for a minute or more. But then it leaves funky lines on my face. i even got a bruise once...thats not cute. The funky lines last longer than the full lips last. The fullness goes away in maybe 5 minutes at most. I feel like im following the instructions too....the first picture shows after i sucked on it for about a minute or two. The second is about two minutes later. So..see for yourself. Lol...its silly! I feel like a kid that sucked on a cup and got it stuck to my face.
customer_reviews.author: ShaynaJo1984

customer_reviews.title: Don’t spend your money !
customer_reviews.text: Honestly don’t waste your money on this. One it takes about 20 tries to figure out to get it to stick in your lips. Two it leaves major bruising that is absolutely noticeable. I saw Another review that said that and I avoided It and now I regret it . Really just a waste of money. The swollen full lips also only last for about a minute - two minutes max nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Rossana Cochran

customer_reviews.title: On the fence
customer_reviews.text: These are a hard plastic. Not soft like I'd expected. Making suctioning hard to do. I think with a silicone plastic it would be easier to choose which part of the lip to place these on and not suck in the whole lip and then some...
customer_reviews.author: Emma Noggle

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is super cute. Comes with a round one and an ...
customer_reviews.text: BE CAREFUL. The first time I used this, I went overboard and ended up giving myself a bruise. The packaging is super cute. Comes with a round one and an oval one with a brush. The first few uses my lips stayed plump for hours. But after a couple days I can use it and a while later I will have to use it again. Not bad for the price. Also I have a before I used it and after photo.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Workman

customer_reviews.title: Great lip plumper if you can use it every 15mins
customer_reviews.text: Great lip plumper if you can use it every 15mins. I have timed how long the lips stay plump once you have achieved the desired plumpness, and they only lasted 15 minutes. They do create a great effect, however doesn’t last long. But maybe this is different between individuals. The outer edge of my lips did not bruise, however, my friend’s bruised immediately and it looked like she had a blue-ish ring around her mouth for 2 days. Mine have never done this! They’re fun for photos, and if you can use every 15mins. lol Fun to use though.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The smaller one is useless, the large one works. It's nice but the results only last about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: Subtle results, so far...
customer_reviews.text: Subtle results,so far... I've been practicing for a few weeks with this and I am getting the hang of the 2 techniques shown on the manufacturer's website. The video was very helpful, the written directions are useful but for me, I had to see the tool used. My results arent dramatic which is what I wanted, since I don't do dramatic makeup, anyhow. I like it, but I don't know if I would reccomend to everyone, but anyone looking to enhance their looks- this is a nice tool to have in your arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Hox.413

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it was actually me or my lips, but tried every possible way and never really worked. I even watched lots of YouTube videos, and still don’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Eugenia Poceiro

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first but after awhile you have to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first but after awhile you have to keep sucking harder and harder to see any results. Also leaves red marks around your lips
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: My fuller lips are smiling!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received them today and tried both the oval and the round shapes just did them for a few seconds as I understand you should start with small amounts of time to work up to longer sessions of pumping. I definitely noticed a difference! I'm 47, and although my lower lip is relatively full, my upper lip has always seemed thin. The results are pretty awesome. As I understand, once I've been plumping for a while, the effect will last longer. Easy to use. Love that I got TWO shapes for the price of one, PLUS an exfoliating lip brush, and all in a cute red bag for storage! :-) yayyy
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Cricket

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works. Of course, your lips lose their plumpness after a little while. It does stay. But it works for a little while and then you can do it again to plump them up again. My lips have never looked so plump.
customer_reviews.author: Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Took a couple tries to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Took a couple tries to get it but once I did it's easy convenient and not painful unless you suck too hard! If it starts feeling to tight blow out resist the urge to breath in or it will tighten up even more. Seems to last longer for me and no bruising maybe because I do several short easy intervals rather than a single intense session. Seller has emailed twice since delivery to see I how I liked product and if I needed any assistance. Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cox

customer_reviews.title: WOW IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This item really works! I took it in slow intervals to see the progress. Kept at it till I acheived the fullness I wanted.Above the upper lip would get a bruise line that shortly faded. Also sometimes bottom lip appeared purple. That too went away shortly. Love this product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I order ❤️💯
customer_reviews.text: Of course it gives a little red mark but if you do it befor you put on make up than you can't even notice. But I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT PURCHASE AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I bought these as a joke for a friend. However, following the instructions TO THE LETTER, it caused really painful sores on his lip, because the suction literally pulled skin off. We tossed them. I'd ask for my money back, but he kept them to show someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really recommend this if you want your lips to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I bought this out of curiosity but I ended up loving it!! It's natural but you can build it up. I really recommend this if you want your lips to be bigger, even if only by a little. Whenever I use this I get a ton of compliments from family, friends, coworkers, and my boyfriend! None of them can figure out what is different but they say I look great!
customer_reviews.author: Mm

customer_reviews.title: Nope.  Don't Bother.
customer_reviews.text: The idea of using suction to draw fluid to your lips to force an effect lasting an hour or so seems fine, but the execution is subpar. This process is amusing at best, I prefer to have not spent the money on hard red plastic cups. Not even a Solo Cup.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great product with instant results- if you use it correctly and have some lips to begin with!
customer_reviews.text: I LITERALLY just came home and tried this on myself- WOW it really works! Combined w my lip plumper gloss this will be a great alternative to more pricey and expensive methods like injections- which never last anyway!!! From the looks of negative reviews I can tell you there are some people who just wont see results esp if your lips are paper thin already, and esp if you aren’t careful in your application. Like anything w suction, you can develop bruising so you must proceed w measured caution. Never thought I’d purchase this bc I thought it was bogus, then I started wondering how I’d look w a little plumpness- thanks Fullips! You have my endorsement!
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I have a thin top lip but a decent sized bottom lip. I have to admit that at first I had trouble getting started. But reading their instruction guide that came with it really helped. And I’ve literally just been practicing in bed for one minute intervals when I got the chance, and I see the results. Lasts like three hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mim423

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this just for fun -- and it really works!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Works as advertised. Lovely presentation, too, in a pretty little red drawstring bag. If you are curious as to how your lips would look with lip filler, this is a fun and inexpensive way to find out! It doesn't last more than an hour, and you have to take the time to read and follow the instructions. It's silly good fun!
customer_reviews.author: Long Tall Sally

customer_reviews.title: Try it!!
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty skeptical about this product. I have done lip injections once before and loved the look but the needle pain was awful and the bruising was so bad I looked like I had been In a fight and the bruises lasted for weeks. The first time I used this product I was amazed at The results. My kids noticed the difference right away lol. It doesn’t last very long but I am assuming like other people have said the more You use it the longer it will Last.
customer_reviews.author: CHRYSTAL D CROCKER

customer_reviews.title: Works for tiny lips. Chaps lips
customer_reviews.text: I have tiny lips. And I was worried this wouldn't work on me...BUT after trying several times It works so good! Looks just like you got lip fillers. But alas it does not last but 2 hours top results and another hour with barely anything there. But you can carry it with you for touch ups. Just be careful it chaps your lips
customer_reviews.author: Morgan n chad

customer_reviews.title: Pouty Lips 👄
customer_reviews.text: This works. Although takes a little getting used to. At first I thought they were too small, and perhaps they are. But as I want to have pouty lips 👄 puffing the center works. Once you master the art of sucking and "relaxing" your lips you will see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Cor-Vital

customer_reviews.title: difficult
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use. Specific instuctions which I did follow. But not good results. No noticeable lip improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Packaged nicely
customer_reviews.text: My lips are very small and the oval size was quite hard to get used to- good thing it comes with as bigger size too! The bigger size is easy to use and works fast. I recommend for anyone with unusually thin lips, along with a cream lip plumper. I use the additional lip brush to exfoliate my lips with a honey and sugar mix, and its fantastic! Never have my lips looked better.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Good product but results take longer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am still in the training phase as this did not work on the first try as I have seen it work for other people. I only see some results after a lot of tries so hopefully it will get easier and faster with time.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: No for me
customer_reviews.text: Don’t do it.... it does not work and if it does .. it really bruises you. Effects don’t last more than 10 min. Just save and get the real thing instead.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Munoz

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t even suck hard and gave myself a little bruise just above ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked well! However be very careful that you have ONLY lip skin under the cup and not facial skin. I didn’t even suck hard and gave myself a little bruise just above my lip which looked like a nice Hitler stash for a few days....
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn D.

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love! It comes with two shaped plumping enhancer
customer_reviews.text: For my second day using it. I'm in love! It comes with two shaped plumping enhancer, one is an oval and the other one is a circle. I've been using the oval one and it's works perfect for me. Yes, the fullness of my lips go away after a few hours but that's because my lips aren't used to it. If I continue with the routine that they advice in the directions paper then the results will be more effective and last longer. Not a scam. I'm a real customer getting real results.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Way too small, could not create a suction and when I managed to get a little section after 100 tries, it out a round red ring around my lips but did nothing for my actual lips. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: All Good

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: At first, I couldn't get these to work. I sent an e-mail to the one you're directed to contact for help with the product. Within 20 minutes I received a detailed response instructing me on what I could try to create the suction. It worked. Even if it hadn't worked, the customer service was so great that it wouldn't have mattered. Impressed with this product all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works well I just highly suggest that if u have small to medium lips u get the rounded one cause I bought all 3 and I feel like the circled one is more universal :)
customer_reviews.author: christian castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Bruising, dangerous, beware
customer_reviews.text: Don't do it!!!! This is scary. I used this thing 1x for about 10 to 20 seconds and this is what I was left with 12hrs later. Absolutely rediculous. They should be ashamed. This bruising is horrible. It's 24hrs later and still bruised!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Using them together works great but again it is not a quick fix with ...
customer_reviews.text: These have to really be used a LOT when you first start. It is more of a circulation thing for your mouth area. The initial plump is purely cosmetic until your mouth starts adapting then it looks more natural and less porn starish. I also use Liptifuls which is a clay lip plumper and trainer. Using them together works great but again it is not a quick fix with only 1 daily use. It is a process much like make-up, hair and even brushing your teeth. Multiple times a day will train your face.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wills

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did not work for me even though I tried and got somewhat results, they weren’t the results I was looking for :( Fortunately though the seller is awesome! She helped me through any questions I had and even followed up to make sure everything was ok. Honestly, THE best seller I’ve ever dealt with! She’s honest, kind and just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: I have natural plump lips as it is but I notice when I’m dehydrated my lips don’t look as full so this little gadget does the trick. The key is to do a few gentle reps to get your lips nice and full with out bruising. Follow the instructions and relax your lips It makes all the difference. The only thing I noticed is that my lips didn’t really fit in the lip plumper but like I said my lips are pretty full to begin with. The photos above are before and after use. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of getting a hickey around your lips!
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged nicely. Unfortunately I got a huge hickey around my lips the first time lol. I got better results from using an empty pill bottle actually. I'd say my lips are average. It's cool for pics but it didn't last very long. I was hoping it would at least last a few hours but it didn't. I have used it only a few times. I was nervous to continue using it cause I didn't want to risk the hickey again. Thank goodness that happened on a wknd when I had no plans.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, it’s a fake!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t do it! Doesn’t work, it’s a fake! It’s dumb! If ur gonna get one? Get the real one, the apple shaped one!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Harst

customer_reviews.title: Apparently this will go away with continued use in a couple of days but I feel and look like a fool with a mustache sized dark mark above ...
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I didn't do a lot of research before buying this product or using this product. The directions in the package also didn't warn me about a cupping bruise that I experienced after using it the first time. Apparently this will go away with continued use in a couple of days but I feel and look like a fool with a mustache sized dark mark above my lip. Will not use this product again. Do your research before trying this!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E. Gamper

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Lips are plump for like.. 10 seconds, then go back to normal. Waste of money, and can’t seem to get results unless use it until it hurts! I didn’t keep mine on long but from the looks of some photos bruising can happen. If I kept mine on any longer that probably would have happened. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Tb

customer_reviews.title: Full Lips
customer_reviews.text: Uh- mazing items , I did some research and thought about this for a while before purchasing and I'm glad I did. I struggled to use it at first and thought about returning it but then I saw the tutorial on how to use it correctly I was hooked! I'm glad I purchase theses and definitely works without a doubt. If I could change anything I'd probably get a smaller size for my lips as the medium oval and large round cup were a bit big for me but I am managing and it was a great purchase. Definitely happy and will recommend to friends
customer_reviews.author: DoDaDew

customer_reviews.title: WOW results!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought on a whim not expecting much and was blown away! I mean you need commen sense and to follow directions to use these effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley linder

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Which it was a flexible silicone rather than hard plastic but it works!. Go slow and figure out where and how long. But great for testing fullness before committing to fillers. Or for some plump for photos.
customer_reviews.author: Cook

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I was curious and these are cheap. These are a waste of money. They are little hard plastic cups, you suck the air out and the suction pulls your lips in. They didn’t work for me. They were also hard to get lasting suction.. maybe they would suction better on someone w/ fuller lips... but if they had full lips already they wouldn’t need this!
customer_reviews.author: Kay M

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars cause it came beautifully wrapped, didn't have a horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I don't know maybe I'm doing it wrong but this did not work for me at all. I watched every video I could on how to do it, followed all the instructions, and nothing. 3 stars cause it came beautifully wrapped, didn't have a horrible smell, and was fun to try.
customer_reviews.author: pedikeensTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Both pieces are really small. It’s hard plastic and very difficult to use. Updated.. The vendor was really accessible. Thank you for your response and to tried explain me how to use the product. Still not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: yadira lopez

customer_reviews.title: wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: It worked but i noticed that my lips started to create tiny wrinkles. I discontinued because I don't want wrinkles. It's great for emergency plumps, i would only use it before taking selfies. It won't last throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: brielle

customer_reviews.title: My lips don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I have thin lips and was excited to give this a go. Unfortunately my lips didn’t fit. Thankfully it came with the extra one that kinda fits my lips but doesn’t add much plump at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical. But I am very pleased with the results! I looked up videos on YouTube and it helped me do it so I wouldn’t get bruised. I only wished it lasted longer. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product. Looks naturally full, instead of fake.
customer_reviews.text: First try. Love the results! Didn’t hurt or bruise. I mostly got this because I have a full bottom lip and a small upper lip. Now they both look full and plump without looking fake.
customer_reviews.author: MissChubbyPanda

customer_reviews.title: 2 years now and still awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! Had it for two years now and still amazing! My lips are so thin and with this you can see them finally! A must buy for sure😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Just didn’t work for me. Maybe I wasn’t doing it right, but I followed the directions and even watched multiple videos. But just couldn’t get it work and plump my lips.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: it was ok, did the trick after a few ...
customer_reviews.text: it was ok, did the trick after a few attempts. Only lasted 30 min max. But look out, it can leave bruising if you do it the right way but too long. I tried Candy Apple Lips and it was easier and quicker, but again, it too left bruising and it too lasted only 30 min. Candy apple you can't fit in your purse for touch ups...these little things can be handy for carrying in your purse for touch ups.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Hard but does the job I guess
customer_reviews.text: This was ok its hard for me to use and i even watch the how to use videos. I thought this product was silicon but its not, it is realy hard plastic. I guess i should of read the discription better. Maybe with practice it will be easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzae_xo

customer_reviews.title: This really works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I am really impressed with how well this works! I have tiny lips and have tried various glosses, etc that did nothing for me. After using this device, there really was a noticeable fullness to my lips. So happy with my purchase... 20 dollars well spent! My order arrived in 2 days, in a cute little package that included a lip brush and an additional enhancer. I also received instructions on how to use it as well as a note from the seller encouraging me to contact her with any issues. Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: JLP22

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it, and am going to use it every day and keep seeing those results and hopefully they stay full. Either way, I am super happy about this entire experience all day today have been doing it in small incriments of time and not too hard on suction to not mess up my lips . They loom and feel great every time. They look and feel super sexy! I am so excited, I can't wait to share the news with my friends and family, honestly!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: One happy customer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most amazing lip plumper system I have ever used. The customer service is more than amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Cole

customer_reviews.title: It works, but lasting effect is short
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it seems to only last 2 hours tops. To have longer results, you would have to do it again. But do not over do it! You could get bruising. Anyone got other suggestions? I’m looking to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Vylar

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product if you're planning to go out and add some plumpness to your lips although I noticed it didn't last as long as I wished. I'm not sure if I have to use this on a daily to keep up with it staying plump but unfortunately I wish it would last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's awesome! Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few days now. It definitely takes some practice as I bruised my lips the first time I tried. But, once you get the hang of it, it's awesome! Works really well. You just have to be careful until you get used to it! I took a before and after and I also put lip plumper gloss on afterwards too, just to give a extra boost.
customer_reviews.author: corrin williams

customer_reviews.title: No miracle
customer_reviews.text: You have to suck on this frequently to be able to sustain the poutiness of your lips. Unfortunately, I don’t have that extra time. I can’t justify the price too. An expensive novelty item.
customer_reviews.author: Ar Man

customer_reviews.title: I think you just have to be smart when using it
customer_reviews.text: I think you just have to be smart when using it. Obviously start off slowly. I had no issues with it at all I use it a few times per day with light suction. Not long lasting however that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy DeFusco

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY- this thing hurts!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how anyone can do this. IT HURTS...if you actually get it on there correctly which itakes time and patience it hurts because it's pulling the blood vessels to the top of your lip and that why they say it could get bruised...WHICH I DID and I didn't even get the effects of the full lips. I had bruising around my lip. I'll keep my small lips and save my time and money
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: It's very temporary and seems like it could cause longterm around the mouth wrinkles (similar ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very temporary and seems like it could cause longterm around the mouth wrinkles (similar to a smoker). It tends to make my whole mouth red for a few minutes after use. It does the job for a quick fix but def. wouldn't last longer than like 30 minutes. If you pull too hard, you WILL get blue lips and it looks scary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The Fullips Lip Plumping Enhancer delivers on its promise to give you temporary lip enhancement. I was surprised at how easy it is to achieve remarkable results. It takes a little practice to apply the enhancer properly (the videos at fullips.com were helpful), but once you achieve the results you want it is very easy to repeat the process. I had too reapply the enhancer a just a few times a day to maintain the look I wanted. Thank you for offering a very inexpensive option to lip injections.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: My lips are definitely bigger!
customer_reviews.text: Got it in the mail not even an hour ago and I busted it right open! I'm so please with this product! Although it doesn't last as long, the results are clear! I will be using it often! Before picture on the top, after on bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Linda was great with offering feedback and helping me get the right ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute product to have, especially with the "pouty-lip-look" trend being everything right now! I carry it around with me just incase I need a quick plump!. The packaging was the cutest and work the money in my opinion. I ordered the medium size but realized soon after the small was probably the way to go. Linda was great with offering feedback and helping me get the right size. Very friendly seller with helpful hints!!! :) (I would insert a pic, but my I have no makeup on and look crazy! 😝 lol)
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging it arrived in and it shipped super quick. It does work, it took me awhile to figure out how to use it correctly, but after watching some you-tube videos I got the hang of it. Very happy with this:)
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: Adorable package!
customer_reviews.text: I was sooo excited to get this! And the packaging...So cute!! It also came with a cute instructions card and with a little nice hand written message. It comes with two, one medium circle and one large oval and also a bonus gift. I saw in some reviews they got a plumping lipgloss but unfortunately I got a small cheap toothbrush..not so happy about that. But overall, so happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these! Takes a minute or two to figure ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these! Takes a minute or two to figure out how to get the suction to work but once you do its easy! I only keep mine on for 25 seconds and it creates the perfect pouty lip!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T.

customer_reviews.title: I'[m a believer!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was highly skeptical about this product, but once I used it - I was sold! It took me a few tries to get it situated correctly, (the package instructions tell you to expect that) but once I got the hang of it, it really worked!!! The plumpness remains longer than I expected - and it's way cheaper than lip injections! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Downum

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but it works!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this product. Although I do prefer the large round enhancer over the medium oval. I struggled with getting the medium to attach. Results with the Large round enhancer worked instantly and lasted about 2.5 hrs. Seller has great communication and genuinely cares about your results. I've received 2 emails directly from Linda pertaining to her product and how things are going. That is greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Andee

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t make a bit of difference.... I’ve tried several times now starting out very slowly & I’ve had nothing except bruising... not bigger, just purple. I’ve watched reviews & it seems it’s for people with already full lips. Mine are not at all so the product would barely even stay on... I wouldn’t buy this again!!
customer_reviews.author: jamie kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Just be Cautious with this product
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely does what it advertises plums the lips you just have to be cautious when using this product because you can’t overdo it and you could hurt yourself
customer_reviews.author: vanessa hunter

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Photos are before and after. These are great if you can’t afford lip injections or want to see how it looks before you make that decision.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: You can see it at the moment you do the suction but it go sway really fast ...and if you keep it suction your lips more than a 1 minutes start to bruise
customer_reviews.author: Yami

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t match the claims made
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to give you plump lips for a few hours however in my opinion this is false. My plump lips lasted probably an entire twenty minutes even with exfoliating and using my too faced lip plumper. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: SherisseS

customer_reviews.title: Lip Suction
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize that these were hard plastic,, it’s kind of uncomfortable to use. Did not work well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Marimen

customer_reviews.title: The circle shape enhancer stays n with great suction, but afterwards it only last for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of LaLa from Vanderpump Rules. She always has this in her snapchats and her lips are so plump and full. The oval shaped enhancer does not stay on my lips. The circle shape enhancer stays n with great suction, but afterwards it only last for a good 10 minutes...
customer_reviews.author: Piggy

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I'm very satisfied with the subtle effects
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They really do work if you do it right, and for the price you get 2 sizes as well as a free gift, you can't beat it. Only issue was one size was too small... I see that was an issue with several other reviewers so keep that in mind when ordering. My lips are pretty small and thin so I expected they would fit both sizes, but only one fit. No big deal, still an awesome product and I've never written a review for a purchase in my entire life, so obviously I'm extremely happy or I wouldn't be reviewing!
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Easton

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These really work! I over plump at night which over time it just takes a couple minutes in the morning to get the results I'm looking to achieve
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I love that they’re super small and convient so I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of full lips! I’ve bought the lip plumper over a few years ago and still use them to this day ! I love that they’re super small and convient so I can just have them in my purse and touch up my pout at anytime. I usually use these on my drive to work or a night out. They always give me a noticeable fresh plump lips.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Luv it
customer_reviews.text: It’s not A replacement for lip fillers but if you don’t want them done this is a great compromise! I use the the medium oval and the large to get nice even lips! I absolutely love it tbh, it’s nice for selfies and just going out so I always look nice! It lasts a few hours and shrinks slowly and naturally(:
customer_reviews.author: Tyra

product_meta.title: Fullips Lip Plumping Tool - Medium Oval Plus Large Round Bonus Self Suction Enhancers and Additional Gift!
feature_bullets: 👄MADE IN AMERICA~Fullips Enhancers are made of hard plastic and use self-suction.Correct size is important for results!Please contact us! See our demos to understand how the self-suction works. Self-suction allows you to control the level of enhancement to create a better lip line and overall lip fullness. Time and practice are important for best effect! Small enough to put in a makeup bag for use before touching up lipstick. Instantly gives you full lips, perfect for special occasions!

👄HOW TO GET PLUMP LIPS: The Fullips lip enhancing device gives instant results. Simply put the opening of the product over your mouth and gently suck in for 15-30 second increments to avoid bruising. The suction results in full luscious lips. Results vary and are temporary but typically last 1-4 hours. Lip plumping tools are the perfect alternative for women who don't want painful lip injections. Get plump lips today with our lip enhancing tool!

👄ACTUAL AMAZON REVIEWS: "Let's be honest, this really works! So happy I found and bought this product. It’s been almost 2 hours since using and my lips are still pretty plump. Works! I was skeptical but was impressed with the results! I LOVE this so much! It actually worked. I was impressed! I'm happy knowing that it is compact and actually does what I want - it plumps my lips. This little prize makes me happy! I get bigger lips in just a couple of minutes."

👄WHY PEOPLE LOVE FULLIPS: We provide tips to make the lip enhancing tool work better and last longer! We also offer excellent customer service, we are here to HELP! Fullips work with self-suction and it can be tricky to use at first but we CAN HELP! If you have trouble getting suction, PLEASE CONTACT US! The size of the lip plumping device is important, so if you need help sizing or buy the wrong size, WE WILL ASSIST YOU! Anything you need, we are here to help you get fuller plumper lips!

👄BUY TODAY, RISK-FREE: We know you will love how luscious your lips will look with this lip enhancing device by Fullips. If for some reason, you are not satisfied we will refund your purchase. Fullips DOES NOT guarantee the safety of counterfeit enhancers and is not liable for any harm caused by counterfeits. We ONLY guarantee the authenticity of extreme lip enhancing devices that are sold by Fullips Enhancers! Contact us for assistance with your lip plumping enhancer. We are here to help!
